RTCPeerConnectionGetConfiguration.summary: The getConfiguration() method of the interface returns an object which indicates the current configuration of the on which the method is called.

remarks.para:
The returned configuration is the last configuration applied via , or if
setConfiguration() hasn't been called, the configuration the RTCPeerConnection was constructed with.
The configuration includes a list of the ICE servers used by the connection, information about transport policies, and identity information.

RTCPeerConnectionGetConfiguration.returns:
An object describing the 's current configuration.
See RTCPeerConnection() for more information on what options are allowed.
